resources.string: \n1.GNUKhata welcome page: \nUser can create new organization or select an existing one.
\n2.Create new organization: \nWhen the user clicks on Create new organization button on the main page, it will call create new organization page.
\n3.Select organization: \nClick on Select existing organization button, this will show select organization page.
\n4.Fill organization details: \nAfter the user fills organization details, click on Save button. If the user do not want to fill the information, he can simply click skip button.
\n5.Preferences: \nUser can add new projects and check the account code using the check-box if manual account code has to be provided.

\n6.Create account: \nUser can create an account under respective group name and subgroup name with an opening balance. This will automatically update the total debit opening balance, total credit opening balance and difference between them.
\n7.Master menu: \nThis is the master menu of GNUKhata. Here, user can create/search account, enter/search transaction, view reports(ledger and trial balance) and add more projects.

\n8.Enter transaction: \nThis page provide the user to enter(see figure [a]) and search(see figure [c]) transactions. home button will take the user to master menu page(see figure [b]). search botton will help to search transaction by voucher reference number, date and narration(see figure [d]).

\n9.Reports Menu: \nThis page provides list of all report types. After the user clicks on report type he will get an alert dialog which will allow him to enter necessary details to view the report. We are done with ledger(see figure [e]) and trial balance(see figure [f]).

GNUKhata is a Free Accounting Software provides students and accountants to carry on there work while on the go. Designed and developed at IIT Bombay. 
 
Version: 0.9 (beta) 
 
Repository: https://github.com/androportal/gkaakash
